5cc86840d7f00c002412c56c.Name: Amunicja 5,7 x 28 mm R37.X
5cc86840d7f00c002412c56c.Description:
Kolejny poziom amunicji o przeznaczeniu obronnym FN 57 od R&R Weapon Systems: R37.F. Pocisk posiada ulepszone właściwości balistyczne, osiąga prędkość od 2100/fps do 2400/fps. Jego właściwości balistyczne są unikalne z powodu fragmentacji pocisku na trzy ostre płatki, które penetrują 5-7 cali, podczas gdy bazowy pocisk przemierza 15-17 cali po spenetrowaniu 4 warstw dżinsu.

Ta amunicja posiada specjalny grzybkujący pocisk. Wykonany w 99.5% z miedzi monolitycznej. Pocisk jest grzybkujący w celu zapewnienia jak największych obrażeń. Jeśli poszukujesz jednego z najbardziej niszczycielskich pocisków FN 5.7 do FN 5.7 lub PS90, to nie szukaj dalej.

5cc86832d7f00c000d3a6e6c.Name: Amunicja 5,7 x 28 mm R37.F
5cc86832d7f00c000d3a6e6c.Description:
Kolejny poziom amunicji o przeznaczeniu obronnym FN 57 od R&R Weapon Systems: R37.F. Pocisk posiada ulepszone właściwości balistyczne, osiąga prędkość od 2100/fps do 2400/fps. Jego właściwości balistyczne są unikalne z powodu fragmentacji pocisku na trzy ostre płatki, które penetrują 5-7 cali, podczas gdy bazowy pocisk przemierza 15-17 cali po spenetrowaniu 4 warstw dżinsu.

Ta amunicja posiada specjalny grzybkujący pocisk.Wykonany w 99.5% z miedzi monolitycznej. Pocisk posiada fragmentujący czubek oraz głęboko penetrującą bazę. Penetracja bazy wynosi od 15 do 17 cali, a penetracja fragmentującego czubka od 5 do 7 cali w żelu balistycznym po spenetrowaniu 4 warstw dżinsu. Jeśli poszukujesz jednego z najbardziej niszczycielskich pocisków FN 5.7 do FN 5.7 lub PS90, to nie szukaj dalej.

5cc701d7e4a94900100ac4e7.Description: Lufa o długości 407 mm do P90 na naboje 5,7 х 28.

5cc82d76e24e8d00134b4b83.Name: Pistolet maszynowy FN P90 5,7 x 28
5cc82d76e24e8d00134b4b83.Description: FN P90, znane również jako FN Project 1990, jest to Broń Ochrony Osobistej (PDW) zaprojektowana i wyprodukowana przez FN Herstal w Belgii. Stworzona jako odpowiedź na zapotrzebowanie NATO jako zastępstwo broni opartych na 9 × 19 mm Parabellum, P90 został zaprojektowany jako broń kompaktowa i jednocześnie potężna dla załóg pojazdów, operatorów broni zespołowej, personelu wsparcia, sił specjalnych oraz grup antyterrorystycznych.

5d02677ad7ad1a04a15c0f95.Name: Hamulec wylotowy Nordic Corvette 7,62 x 51 do AR-10
5d02677ad7ad1a04a15c0f95.Description: Corvette jest skutecznym hamulcem wylotowym do broni opartych na systemie AR-10. Wyprodukowany przez Nordic.

5d08d21286f774736e7c94c3.Name: Klucz Nawigatora
5d08d21286f774736e7c94c3.Description: Key from Svetloozersk gang stash, usually kept by Shturman. It looks very flimsy, it can break from one use.

5d026791d7ad1a04a067ea63.Name: Hamulec wylotowy Fortis Red Brake 7,62 x 51 do AR-10
5d026791d7ad1a04a067ea63.Description: Red Brake jest skutecznym hamulcem wylotowym do broni opartych na systemie AR-10. Wyprodukowany przez Fortis.

5d02797c86f774203f38e30a.Name: Polowy zestaw chirurgiczny Surv12
5d02797c86f774203f38e30a.Description: Zaawansowany zestaw chirurgiczny z dodatkowymi i lepszymi narzędziami, umożliwia wyleczenie poważnych ran na polu bitwy.

5d02676dd7ad1a049e54f6dc.Name: Hamulec wylotowy Nordic Corvette 5,56 x 45 do AR-15
5d02676dd7ad1a049e54f6dc.Description: Corvette jest skutecznym hamulcem wylotowym do broni opartych na systemie AR-15. Wyprodukowany przez Nordic.

5d0376a486f7747d8050965c.Name: Wojskowy obwód drukowany
5d0376a486f7747d8050965c.Description: Electronic part used in military vehicles and systems.

5d124c01d7ad1a115c7d59fb.Name: Krótka okładzina KAC do URX 3/3.1 FDE
5d124c01d7ad1a115c7d59fb.Description: Krótka okładzina szyny do nakładek lufy URX 3/3.1, wyprodukowana przez Knights Armament.

5d123b70d7ad1a0ee35e0754.Name: Długa okładzina KAC do URX 3/3.1
5d123b70d7ad1a0ee35e0754.Description: Długa okładzina szyny do nakładek lufy URX 3/3.1, wyprodukowana przez Knights Armament.

5d123a3cd7ad1a004e476058.Name: Krótka okładzina KAC do URX 3/3.1
5d123a3cd7ad1a004e476058.Description: Krótka okładzina szyny do nakładek lufy URX 3/3.1, wyprodukowana przez Knights Armament.

5d0375ff86f774186372f685.Name: Kabel wojskowy
5d0375ff86f774186372f685.Description: Wzmocniony kabel wojskowy przeznaczony do użycia w systemach ze zwiększoną intensywnością eksploatacji.

5d025cc1d7ad1a53845279ef.Name: Chwyt pistoletowy HK Ergo PSG-1 style do systemów opartych na AR-15
5d025cc1d7ad1a53845279ef.Description: Chwyt pistoletowy Ergo PSG-1 style może być zainstalowany na dowolnej broni kompatybilnej z chwytami AR-15.

5d024f5cd7ad1a04a067e91a.Name: Szyna Arbalet Patriot K+W
5d024f5cd7ad1a04a067e91a.Description: Szyna Patriot K+W do karabinu Mosin wyprodukowana przez Arbalet.

5d0379a886f77420407aa271.Name: Pocisk OFZ 30х160 mm
5d0379a886f77420407aa271.Description: 30-milimetrowy pocisk odłamkowy do działka 30 mm 2A42 używanego w pojazdach opancerzonych i helikopterach.

5d123102d7ad1a004e475fe5.Name: Nakładka lufy URX 3 8" do AR-15
5d123102d7ad1a004e475fe5.Description: Nakładka lufy Knights Armament URX 3 do AR-15 wyposażona w unikalny system do montażu dodatkowego oprzyrządowania.

5d135ecbd7ad1a21c176542e.Name: Kolba Magpul CTR FDE
5d135ecbd7ad1a21c176542e.Description: Wymienna kolba MOE do karabinków AR-15/M16 produkowana przez zakłady Magpul Original Equipment. Montowana na standardowych prowadnicach. Profil ramy zapobiega zdzieraniu się i zasłania zatrzask, aby zapobiec jego przypadkowemu uruchomieniu. Zapewnia możliwość przymocowania standardowej gumowej podkładki o grubości 0,3 cala, aby broń nie ześlizgiwała się ani po kamizelce, ani oporządzeniu taktycznym.

5d03775b86f774203e7e0c4b.Name: Element szyku fazowanego
5d03775b86f774203e7e0c4b.Description: Zaawansowana technologicznie cześć anten szyku fazowanego, stosowanych w systemach radarowych i systemach walki radioelektronicznej.

5d135e83d7ad1a21b83f42d8.Name: Kolba Magpul CTR
5d135e83d7ad1a21b83f42d8.Description: Wymienna kolba MOE do karabinków AR-15/M16 produkowana przez zakłady Magpul Original Equipment. Montowana na standardowych prowadnicach. Profil ramy zapobiega zdzieraniu się i zasłania zatrzask, aby zapobiec jego przypadkowemu uruchomieniu. Zapewnia możliwość przymocowania standardowej gumowej podkładki o grubości 0,3 cala, aby broń nie ześlizgiwała się ani po kamizelce, ani oporządzeniu taktycznym.

5d15cf3bd7ad1a67e71518b2.Name: Chwyt pistoletowy Magpul MOE AR-15 (FDE)
5d15cf3bd7ad1a67e71518b2.Description: Polimerowy chwyt pistoletowy Magpul MOE (Magpul Original Equipment) może być zainstalowany na dowolnej broni kompatybilnej z chwytami pistoletowymi systemu AR-15. Dzięki ergonomicznym kształtom i powierzchni przeciwpoślizgowej, chwyt i kontrola broni staje się bardziej komfortowa. Wnętrze chwytu posiada pustą przestrzeń na części zamienne, narzędzia, akcesoria bądź baterie.

5d0378d486f77420421a5ff4.Name: Wojskowy rezystor mocy
5d0378d486f77420421a5ff4.Description: Wojskowy rezystor mocy używany w pojazdach opancerzonych.

5d03794386f77420415576f5.Name: Akumulator wojskowy 6-STEN-140-M
5d03794386f77420415576f5.Description: Akumulator czołgowy o zwiększonej pojemności. Elektronika wojskowa.

5d120a10d7ad1a4e1026ba85.Name: Kolba Double Star Ace Socom gen.4 do AR-15
5d120a10d7ad1a4e1026ba85.Description: 4. generacja sławnej kolby Socom produkcji Double Star.

5d0a3a58d7ad1a669c15ca14.Name: Luneta KMZ 1P59 3-10x
5d0a3a58d7ad1a669c15ca14.Description: The 1P59 "Hyperon" pancratic sight is designed to increase the effectiveness of firing from SVD in comparison with the standard PSO-1 sight by 1.3 ... 2 times (depending on the range and size of the target) due to a larger zoom, the use of a more accurate range finder, combining operations of measuring the distance to the target and entering the aiming angles, as well as placing the scale for entering the aiming angles in the sight field of view.

5d0a29fed7ad1a002769ad08.Name: Montaż KMZ 1P69 Weaver
5d0a29fed7ad1a002769ad08.Description: Uniwersalna podstawa ze zintegrowanym źródłem energii do instalacji lunety 1P59 na szynach typu "Weaver".

5d0a29ead7ad1a0026013f27.Name: Szyna montażowa „jaskółczy ogon” KMZ 1P59
5d0a29ead7ad1a0026013f27.Description: Uniwersalna uchwyt do lunety 1P59 do instalacji na szyna montażowej typu „jaskółczy ogon”.

5d0a3e8cd7ad1a6f6a3d35bd.Name: Luneta KMZ 1P69 3-10x
5d0a3e8cd7ad1a6f6a3d35bd.Description: The 1P69 "Hyperon" pancratic Sight is a further development of the "Hyperon" sights and is intended for installation on the SV-98 in order to increase the effectiveness on the battlefield. The sight has a flexible adjustment of the multiples, as well as a fairly accurate range finder, facilitating the operation of combining, measuring the distance to the target and entering the aiming angles.

5d1b198cd7ad1a604869ad72.Name: Nakładka lufy TDI AKM-L do АК
5d1b198cd7ad1a604869ad72.Description: TDI AKM-L może zostać zainstalowana na bron kompatybilnej z systemami AKM/AK-74. Wyposażona w mocowania M-LOK do instalacji dodatkowych urządzeń lub szyn.

5d15ce51d7ad1a1eff619092.Name: Nakładka lufy Alfa Arms Goliaf AKS-74U
5d15ce51d7ad1a1eff619092.Description: Nakładka lufy jest wykonana ze stopu aluminium D16T z czarną powłoką i może być zamontowana zamiast standardowego chwytu przedniego na AKS-74U. Wyposażona w szyny Picatinny po trzech stronach, które umożliwiają montaż akcesoriów (m. in.: oświetlenia taktycznego, laserowych wskaźników celu czy chwytów taktycznych).

5d124c1ad7ad1a12227c53a7.Name: Chwyt stopper KAC do URX 3/3.1 FDE
5d124c1ad7ad1a12227c53a7.Description: Chwyt stopper KAC do nakładek lufy URX 3/3.1, wyprodukowany przez Knights Armament.

5d120a28d7ad1a1c8962e295.Name: Nakładka przeciwodrzutowa Double Star 0.5 do kolb z serii ACE
5d120a28d7ad1a1c8962e295.Description: Krótka nakładka przeciwodrzutowa Double Star do kolb ACE.

5d124c0ed7ad1a10d168dd9b.Name: Długa okładzina KAC do URX 3/3.1 FDE
5d124c0ed7ad1a10d168dd9b.Description: Długa okładzina szyny do nakładek lufy URX 3/3.1, wyprodukowana przez Knights Armament.

5d10b49bd7ad1a1a560708b0.Name: Urządzenie taktyczne AN/PEQ-2
5d10b49bd7ad1a1a560708b0.Description: Celownik laserowy ATPIAL (Advanced Target Pointer Illuminator Aiming Laser) AN/PEQ-2, produkowany przez L3 Insight Technologies. Urządzenie taktyczne, łączące zarówno wskaźnik laserowy w paśmie widocznym, jak i w paśmie podczerwieni z reflektorem podczerwonym.

5d1b2f3f86f774252167a52c.Name: Filtr-pochłaniacz FP-100
5d1b2f3f86f774252167a52c.Description: Filtr-pochłaniacz FP-100 przeznaczony jest do oczyszczania zanieczyszczonego powietrza w różnych gałęziach przemysłu, od przemysłu chemicznego, radioaktywnego pyłu i bakterii (biologicznych) rozpylonej cieczy.

5d19cd96d7ad1a4a992c9f52.Name: Nakładka lufy PTR Tri-Rail MP5
5d19cd96d7ad1a4a992c9f52.Description: Handguard for MP5 produced by PTR, equipped with 3 rail mounts for installation of additional devices.

5d1b5e94d7ad1a2b865a96b0.Name: Luneta termiczna FLIR RS-32 2.25-9x 35mm 60Hz
5d1b5e94d7ad1a2b865a96b0.Description: Uniwersalna luneta termowizyjna z wieloma zastosowaniami i zaletami. Może być zainstalowana na broń do wykorzystania w postaci lunety lub na hełmie - przez adapter - jako okular i jako oddzielne urządzenie obserwacyjne.

5d133067d7ad1a33013f95b4.Name: 3-calowa szyna KAC URX
5d133067d7ad1a33013f95b4.Description: 3-calowa szyna KAC do URX 3 pozwala na instalację dodatkowego wyposażenia na nakładkach luf z systemem mocowań KAC.

5d1340cad7ad1a0b0b249869.Name: 30-nabojowy magazynek PMAG GEN M3 FDE W 30 5,56 × 45 STANAG
5d1340cad7ad1a0b0b249869.Description: 30-nabojowy, polimerowy magazynek Magpul PMAG GEN M3 30 na amunicję 5,56 × 45 mm, z otworem obserwacyjnym.

5d1c819a86f774771b0acd6c.Name: Części broni
5d1c819a86f774771b0acd6c.Description: Różne części broni, niezbędne do wymiany uszkodzonych części lub do produkcji rzemieślniczej broni.

5d1340b3d7ad1a0b52682ed7.Name: 30-nabojowy magazynek PMAG GEN M3 30 5,56x45 STANAG
5d1340b3d7ad1a0b52682ed7.Description: 30-nabojowy, polimerowy magazynek Magpul PMAG GEN M3 30 na amunicję 5,56 × 45 mm.

5d1b3a5d86f774252167ba22.Name: Sterta leków
5d1b3a5d86f774252167ba22.Description: Various medicines and drugs, necessary for the production of meds and filling the contents of individual first-aid kits.

5d1c702ad7ad1a632267f429.Name: Kolba Fab Defence GLR-17 do Glock i kompatybilnych
5d1c702ad7ad1a632267f429.Description: Teleskopowa kolba GLR-17 zaprojektowana i produkowana przez Fab Defence.

5d1f819086f7744b355c219b.Name: Hamulec wylotowy Daniel Defence Wave 7,62 x 51
5d1f819086f7744b355c219b.Description: Daniel Defence Wave jest bardzo skutecznym hamulcem wylotowym, który również może posłużyć jako platforma do mocowania tłumika dźwięku Wave QD.

5d1b327086f7742525194449.Name: Czujnik ciśnienia
5d1b327086f7742525194449.Description: Przyrząd do pomiaru ciśnienia w rurach, zbiornikach i innych wyizolowanych systemach.

5d1b31ce86f7742523398394.Name: Szczypce okrągłe
5d1b31ce86f7742523398394.Description: Narzędzie, które pozwala zginać przewody o różnej grubości.

5d1b2fa286f77425227d1674.Name: Silnik elektryczny
5d1b2fa286f77425227d1674.Description: Mały elektromechaniczny przetwornik, za pomocą którego energia elektryczna jest przekształcana w energię mechaniczną. Niezastąpiona rzecz w produkcji i inżynierii.

5d123b7dd7ad1a004f01b262.Name: Chwyt stopper KAC do URX 3/3.1
5d123b7dd7ad1a004f01b262.Description: Chwyt stopper KAC do nakładek lufy URX 3/3.1, wyprodukowany przez Knights Armament.

5d1b2ffd86f77425243e8d17.Name: Obiektyw NIXXOR
5d1b2ffd86f77425243e8d17.Description: Obiektyw do sprzętu video i systemów bezpieczeństwa.

5d1b36a186f7742523398433.Name: Metalowy kanister
5d1b36a186f7742523398433.Description: Metalowy kanister na ciekłe substancje łatwopalne.

5d1b309586f77425227d1676.Name: Rozbity LCD
5d1b309586f77425227d1676.Description: Uszkodzony ciekłokrystaliczny wyświetlacz. Zawiera wiele przydatnych mikroelektronicznych części

5d1b385e86f774252167b98a.Name: Filtr wody
5d1b385e86f774252167b98a.Description: Filtr węglowy do wody wykorzystywany zarówno w produkcji, w przemyśle spożywczym, jak i w gospodarstwach domowych. Jest przeznaczony do oczyszczania wody z zanieczyszczeń.

5d1c774f86f7746d6620f8db.Name: Radiator helix
5d1c774f86f7746d6620f8db.Description: Radiator helix do przemysłowych urządzeń grzewczych. Nagrzewa się pod wpływem energii elektrycznej i rozprasza ciepło w pokoju.

5d1340bdd7ad1a0e8d245aab.Name: 40-nabojowy magazynek PMAG GEN M3 FDE 40 5,56 × 45 STANAG
5d1340bdd7ad1a0e8d245aab.Description: 40-nabojowy, polimerowy magazynek Magpul PMAG GEN M3 40 na amunicję 5,56 × 45 mm.

5d1b376e86f774252519444e.Name: Bimber "Dziki Hatchling"
5d1b376e86f774252519444e.Description: Najwyższej klasy bimber prosto z kryjówki. Sześciokrotna destylacja, oczyszczanie, krystalizacja i jonizacja procesu wrzenia doprowadziła do powstania tego 79-procentowego napoju. Należy pamiętać, że spożywanie alkoholu może prowadzić do smutnych konsekwencji.

5d1b32c186f774252167a530.Name: Termometr analogowy
5d1b32c186f774252167a530.Description: Termometr przeznaczony do pomiaru i kontroli temperatury ciekłych materiałów.

5d1b392c86f77425243e98fe.Name: Żarówka
5d1b392c86f77425243e98fe.Description: Klasyczna żarówka. Delikatna, często się przepala, słabo świeci i zużywa dużo energii elektrycznej.

5d235a5986f77443f6329bc6.Name: Sygnet ze złotą czaszką
5d235a5986f77443f6329bc6.Description: Sygnet w kształcie czaszki, prawdziwy atrybut zbira, który osiągnął sukces.

5d1b304286f774253763a528.Name: Działający LCD
5d1b304286f774253763a528.Description: Nienaruszony i działający wyświetlacz ciekłokrystaliczny. Może być używany w systemach nadzoru video jako urządzenie wizualizacji sygnału.

5d1b313086f77425227d1678.Name: Przekaźnik kontroli fazy
5d1b313086f77425227d1678.Description: Urządzenie przeznaczone do ochrony silnika elektrycznego lub instalacji elektrycznych zasilanych z trójfazowej sieci elektrycznej.

5d1b33a686f7742523398398.Name: Oczyszczona woda
5d1b33a686f7742523398398.Description: Enriched, purified water, which is not only tasty, but also good for your health.

5d235b4d86f7742e017bc88a.Name: Moneta GP
5d235b4d86f7742e017bc88a.Description: Na tej złotej monecie wygrawerowano napis "Админ, накинь ГПшек" co, jeśli wierzyć pogłoskom, oznacza, że była używana do opłacania usług PMC w trakcie Contract Wars.

5d2369418abbc306c62e0c80.Name: Latarka taktyczna Steiner Dbal PL
5d2369418abbc306c62e0c80.Description: Latarka LED Steiner Dbal PL z zielonym laserem.

5d1b39a386f774252339976f.Name: Rurka silikonowa
5d1b39a386f774252339976f.Description: Silikonowa rurka o średnicy 20 mm. Niezbędna rzecz w przemyśle chemicznym, a w szczególności produkcji bimbru.

5d235bb686f77443f4331278.Name: Mała walizka S I C C
5d235bb686f77443f4331278.Description: Mała miękka walizka do przechowywania różnych małych przedmiotów jak karty dostępu, banknoty, monety oraz nieśmiertelniki i klucze.

5d1b371186f774253763a656.Name: Ekspedycyjny kanister na paliwo
5d1b371186f774253763a656.Description: Plastikowy lekki ekspedycyjny kanister na paliwo.

5d25a6538abbc306c62e630d.Name: 10-nabojowy magazynek AICS M700 .308
5d25a6538abbc306c62e630d.Description: 10-nabojowy magazynek na naboje .308 do karabinu wyborowego M700, wyprodukowany przez Accuracy International.

5d25af8f8abbc3055079fec5.Name: 10-nabojowy magazynek Promag AA-70 .308 do M700
5d25af8f8abbc3055079fec5.Description: 10-nabojowy magazynek do karabinu wyborowego M700 produkcji Promag, przeznaczony do łoża Archangel M700 na naboje .308.

5d25a4a98abbc30b917421a4.Name: 5-nabojowy magazynek AICS M700 .308
5d25a4a98abbc30b917421a4.Description: 5-nabojowy magazynek na naboje .308 do karabinu wyborowego M700, wyprodukowany przez Accuracy International.

5d25a6a48abbc306c62e6310.Name: 12-nabojowy magazynek MDT AICS M700 .308
5d25a6a48abbc306c62e6310.Description: 12-nabojowy magazynek na naboje .308 do karabinu wyborowego M700, wyprodukowany przez Modular Driven Technologies LP.

5d25a7b88abbc3054f3e60bc.Name: 10-nabojowy magazynek Magpul PMAG .308 AC do M700
5d25a7b88abbc3054f3e60bc.Description: 10-nabojowy polimerowy magazynek na naboje .308 do karabinu wyborowego M700, wyprodukowany przez Magpul.

5d25d0ac8abbc3054f3e61f7.Name: Łoże polimerowe AT AICS do M700
5d25d0ac8abbc3054f3e61f7.Description: Polimerowe łoże AT AICS do karabinu wyborowego Remington Model 700.

5d3eb59ea4b9361c284bb4b2.Name: Gwintowana lufa do Five-seveN 5,7 x 28
5d3eb59ea4b9361c284bb4b2.Description: Standardowa gwintowana lufa do pistoletu Five-seveN, wyprodukowana przez Fabrique Nationale of Herstal.

5d2f0d8048f0356c925bc3b0.Name: Pistolet maszynowy HK MP5 Kurz 9x19
5d2f0d8048f0356c925bc3b0.Description: HK MP5K(K od niemieckiego słowa Kurz - "krótki") jest krótszą wersją MP5, która została zaprojektowana do walki w ciasnych pomieszczeniach na użytek służb specjalnych.

5d3eb5b6a4b9361eab311902.Name: Lufa do Five-seveN 5,7 x 28
5d3eb5b6a4b9361eab311902.Description: Standardowa lufa do pistoletu Five-seveN, wyprodukowana przez Fabrique Nationale of Herstal.

5d4041f086f7743cac3f22a7.Name: Pasta do zębów Ortodontox
5d4041f086f7743cac3f22a7.Description: Pasta polecana przez 9 na 10 dentystów. Dentysta, który jej nie polecił wyraźnie nie był sobą, ponieważ od początku polecał ją do pastowania butów.

5d2703038abbc3105103d94c.Name: 20-calowa lufa do Remington M700 7,62 × 51 NATO ze stali nierdzewnej
5d2703038abbc3105103d94c.Description: 20-calowa lufa ze stali nierdzewnej do karabinu M700 zasilanego amunicją 7,62 × 51 mm NATO.

5d3eb3b0a4b93615055e84d2.Name: Pistolet FN Five-seveN MK2 5,7 x 28
5d3eb3b0a4b93615055e84d2.Description: FN Five-seven, znak towarowy Five-seveN, jest samopowtarzalnym pistoletem zaprojektowanym i stworzonym przez FN Herstal w Belgii

5d43021ca4b9362eab4b5e25.Name: Karabinek Lone Star TX-15 DML
5d43021ca4b9362eab4b5e25.Description: Seria TX15 Designated Marksman Light (DML) ustanawia standard dla karabinków półautomatycznych. Do jego produkcji wykorzystano wiedzę pozyskaną w trakcie produkcji serii Multi Purpose Carbine, DML jest stworzony do strzelania na średnim dystansie.

5d2f259b48f0355a844acd74.Name: Polimerowa nakładka lufy MP5k
5d2f259b48f0355a844acd74.Description: Polimerowa nakładka lufy do pistoletu maszynowego, produkowanego przez HK, MP5 Kurz.

5d403f9186f7743cac3f229b.Name: Butelka Whiskey Dan Jackiel
5d403f9186f7743cac3f229b.Description: Najbardziej popularna whiskey pośród PMC. Unikalna filtracja napoju odbywa się dzięki węglowi uzyskanego ze spalania cukru brzozowego Samara. Napój wydaje się alkoholowy, a alkohol jest szkodliwy. Zwłaszcza dla takiego wojownika jak ty.

5d2c829448f0353a5c7d6674.Name: Drewniana nakładka lufy CAF WASR 10-63
5d2c829448f0353a5c7d6674.Description: Rumuńska nakładka lufy kompatybilna a karabinkami AK produkowana przez Cugir Arms Factory.

5d4405aaa4b9361e6a4e6bd3.Name: Lekka komora zamkowa 5,56 x 45 do karabinka TX15
5d4405aaa4b9361e6a4e6bd3.Description: Komora zamkowa do karabinka TX15 produkowana przez Lone Star. Wyposażona w szyny do montażu dodatkowych urządzeń.

5d3eb44aa4b93650d64e4979.Name: Zamek do pistoletu Five-seveN MK2

5d2f261548f03576f500e7b7.Description: Standardowa komora zamkowa do MP5 Kurz wyprodukowana przez HK.

5d4042a986f7743185265463.Description: Długi płaski śrubokręt do prac w miejscach z utrudnionym dostępem.

5d44064fa4b9361e4f6eb8b5.Name: Tłumik dźwięku Thunder Beast Ultra 5
5d44064fa4b9361e4f6eb8b5.Description: Tłumik dźwięku Ultra 5 zaprojektowany do użytku z amunicją 7,62 × 51 mm NATO, lecz funkcjonuje również jako wielokalibrowy tłumik do różnych broni, zapewnia doskonałe osiągi przy 7,62 mm NATO, .300 AAC, 6,8 mm SPC, 6,5 mm oraz 5,56 mm NATO. Możliwy do zamontowania tylko z kompatybilnym urządzeniem zaprojektowanym przez Thunder Beast.

5d2da1e948f035477b1ce2ba.Name: Celownik kolimatorowy Trijicon SRS-02
5d2da1e948f035477b1ce2ba.Description: Celownik kolimatorowy SRS-02 wyprodukowany przez Trijicon.

5d2f2d5748f03572ec0c0139.Name: Rączka przeładowania do MP5 Kurz
5d2f2d5748f03572ec0c0139.Description: Standardowa rączka przeładowania do HK MP5 Kurz.

5d44069ca4b9361ebd26fc37.Name: Kolba Magpul PRS GEN3

5d2c770c48f0354b4a07c100.Name: Osłona zamka Fab Defence PDC do AK-74
5d2c770c48f0354b4a07c100.Description: Osłona zamka Fab Defence PDC ze zintegrowaną szyną Picatinny jest kompatybilna ze wszystkimi modelami karabinków opartych na systemie AK.

5d44334ba4b9362b346d1948.Name: Rączka przeładowania Raptor do AR-15, szara
5d44334ba4b9362b346d1948.Description: Rączka przeładowania Raptor do AR-15 i kompatybilnych. Model barwiony na szaro.

5d4406a8a4b9361e4f6eb8b7.Description: Kolba PRS GEN3 wyprodukowana przez Magpul. Model barwiony na szaro.

5d270ca28abbc31ee25ee821.Description: Zabezpieczenie gwintu lufy ze stali nierdzewnej do M700.

5d2f2ab648f03550091993ca.Name: 12,7 x 108 mm BZT-44M
5d2f2ab648f03550091993ca.Description: Modernizacja naboju 12,7 BZT-44 została przeprowadzona w “TsNIITOCHMASH” we wczesnych latach 90-tych. Nowy nabój został wprowadzony w 2002 i został nazwany jako nabój smugowy 12,7 x 108 mm ze zwiększoną penetracją BZT-44M.

5d2f25bc48f03502573e5d85.Description: Zaślepka kolby z montażem zawieszenia do produkowanych przez HK, MP5 Kurz.

5d2702e88abbc31ed91efc44.Description: 26-calowa lufa do karabinu Remington Model 700 7,62 × 51 NATO ze stali nierdzewnej.

5d2c76ed48f03532f2136169.Name: Pokrywa komory zamkowej AKademia Bastion do AK
5d2c76ed48f03532f2136169.Description: Pokrywa komory zamkowej Bastion ze zintegrowaną szyną Picatinny jest kompatybilna ze wszystkimi modelami karabinków opartych na systemie AK.

5d2c772c48f0355d95672c25.Name: Osłona zamka TWS Dog leg do AK-
5d2c772c48f0355d95672c25.Description: Osłona zamka TWS Dog leg rail ze zintegrowaną szyną Picatinny jest kompatybilna ze wszystkimi modelami karabinków opartych na systemie AK.

5d4aaa54a4b9365392071170.Name: Nakładka lufy TDI AKM-L do AK, Anodyzowany Czerwony
5d4aaa54a4b9365392071170.Description: TDI AKM-L może być zainstalowana na broni kompatybilnej z systemami AKM/AK-74. Wyposażona w mocowania M-LOK do instalacji dodatkowych urządzeń lub szyn. Anodyzowany Czerwony.

5d40407c86f774318526545a.Name: Butelka wódki Tarkovskaya
5d40407c86f774318526545a.Description: "Ognista woda Tarkovskaya". Jej użycie nie jest zalecane, alkohol szkodzi zdrowiu i tak dalej, ale czasami trzeba odpocząć po walce. Jednak nie trzeba rajdować Strefy 51, żeby zobaczyć kosmitów.

5d4aab30a4b9365435358c55.Name: Biała nakładka lufy VS-24 z komorą gazową VS-33c do AK
5d4aab30a4b9365435358c55.Description: Nakładka lufy VS-24 z komorą gazową VS-33c. Wyprodukowana przez VS. Barwiona na biało.

5d3eb536a4b9363b1f22f8e2.Name: Standardowa muszka Five-seveN MK2
5d3eb536a4b9363b1f22f8e2.Description: Standardowa muszka do pistoletu Five-seveN MK2, wyprodukowana przez Fabrique Nationale of Herstal.

5d443f8fa4b93678dd4a01aa.Name: Hamulec wylotowy Thunder Beast 30CB 7,62 x 51
5d443f8fa4b93678dd4a01aa.Description: Thunder Beast 30CB jest bardzo skutecznym hamulcem wylotowym, który również może posłużyć jako platforma do mocowania tłumika dźwięku QD.

5d5d646386f7742797261fd9.Name: Wzmocniona kamizelka 6B3TM-01M
5d5d646386f7742797261fd9.Description: Zmodyfikowana podstawowa wojskowa kamizelka 6B3 o nazwie 6B3TM-01M. Aktywnie używana podczas wojny w Afganistanie. Posiada pełną tytanową ochronę 4. klasy GOST i zawiera wiele ładownicna magazynki i granaty.

5d5d87f786f77427997cfaef.Name: Ars Arma A18 Skanda plate carrier
5d5d87f786f77427997cfaef.Description: Plate carrier with armor plates (class 4) with chest and back protection only. And is equipped with a set of pouches.

5d40412b86f7743cb332ac3a.Name: Szampon Schaman
5d40412b86f7743cb332ac3a.Description: Szampon do włosów Schaman o zapachu melona, grilla i dworca autobusowego.

5d4aaa73a4b9365392071175.Name: Nakładka lufy TDI AKM-L do AK, Anodyzowany Brąz
5d4aaa73a4b9365392071175.Description: TDI AKM-L może być zainstalowana na broni kompatybilnej z systemami AKM/AK-74. Wyposażona w mocowania M-LOK do instalacji dodatkowych urządzeń lub szyn. Anodyzowany Brąz.

5d440b9fa4b93601354d480c.Name: 20-calowa lufa 5,56 x 45 do AR-15 i kompatybilnych
5d440b9fa4b93601354d480c.Description: Lufa o długości 20 cali do broni opartych na AR-15 na naboje 5,56 × 45 mm NATO.

5d6e6891a4b9361bd473feea.Name: Breneka "Poleva-3" 12/70
5d6e6891a4b9361bd473feea.Description: Grzybkująca breneka "Poleva-3" 12/70 do strzelb o kalibrze 12ga

5d5fca1ea4b93635fd598c07.Name: Okulary taktyczne Crossbow
5d5fca1ea4b93635fd598c07.Description: Okulary balistyczne z odpornymi na uderzenie poliwęglanowymi soczewkami.

5d5d85c586f774279a21cbdb.Name: Kamizelka Haley Strategic D3CRX
5d5d85c586f774279a21cbdb.Description: Kamizelka Haley Strategic D3CRX Combat jest jedną z najbardziej cenionych pośród PMC. Wygoda i komfort użytkowania zapewniony przez obecność optymalnej liczby ładownic.

5d6d3829a4b9361bc8618943.Name: Przyłbica hełmu LSHZ-2DTM
5d6d3829a4b9361bc8618943.Description: Struktura kuloodpornej przyłbicy hełmy LSHZ-2DTM składa się z kombinacji materiałów kompozytowych i kuloodpornego szkła, które zapewnia lepszą ochronę.

5d6e6869a4b9361c140bcfde.Name: Breneka Grizzly 40 12/70
5d6e6869a4b9361c140bcfde.Description: Grzybkująca breneka Grizzly 40 12/70 do strzelb o kalibrze 12ga

5d6e68b3a4b9361bca7e50b5.Name: Breneka 12/70 HP Slug Copper Sabot Premier
5d6e68b3a4b9361bca7e50b5.Description: Breneka Cooper solid 12/70 do strzelb kalibru 12ga.

5d5d940f86f7742797262046.Name: Plecak Oakley Mechanism heavy duty (czarny)
5d5d940f86f7742797262046.Description: Plecak Mechanism oferuje wszechstronną i wytrzymała konstrukcję, która nadaje się do wszelkiej wędrówki. Wytrzymałem metalowe zapięcia i suwaki zapewniają bezpieczne przechowywanie, górne odpinane otwarcie zapewnia więcej przestrzenie do przenoszenia większych przedmiotów. Wiele wyspecjalizowanych kieszeni zapewnia wojskową organizację i łatwy dostęp, a miękkie i regulowane pasy sprawiają, że wszelka wyprawa jest komfortowa.

5d6e689ca4b9361bc8618956.Name: Breneka "Poleva-6u" 12/70
5d6e689ca4b9361bc8618956.Description: Pełnopłaszczowa breneka "Poleva-6u" 12/70 do strzelb o kalibrze 12ga

5d6e69c7a4b9360b6c0d54e4.Name: Amunicja śrutowa 7,3 mm 20/70
5d6e69c7a4b9360b6c0d54e4.Description: Nabój 20/70 z pociskiem składającym się z 9 śrucin 7,3 mm do strzelb o kalibrze 20ga

5d6d2ef3a4b93618084f58bd.Name: Okulary RayBench Aviator
5d6d2ef3a4b93618084f58bd.Description: Legendarne okulary najemników na całym świecie. Noś je jeśli chcesz być cool, jak Vovan z sąsiedztwa.

5d5e7d28a4b936645d161203.Name: Hełm MSA ACH TC-2001 MICH Series
5d5e7d28a4b936645d161203.Description: Hełm MSA Advanced Combat Helmet (ACH) zapewnia zaawansowaną ochronę balistyczną, przeciwodłamkową oraz przeciwuderzeniową, jednocześnie gwarantując komfortowe i długie użytkowanie. Niskoprofilowa konstrukcja hełmu zmniejsza ryzyko ograniczenia pola widzenia oraz zapewnia kompatybilność noktowizorów i zestawów słuchawkowych.

5d5d8ca986f7742798716522.Name: Kamizelka SOE Micro
5d5d8ca986f7742798716522.Description: Bardzo lekka i mała kamizelka zapewniająca niezbędne minimum ładownic.

5d5e9c74a4b9364855191c40.Name: Hełm MSA ACH TC-2002 MICH Series
5d5e9c74a4b9364855191c40.Description: Hełm MSA Advanced Combat Helmet (ACH) zapewnia zaawansowaną ochronę balistyczną, przeciwodłamkową oraz przeciwuderzeniową, jednocześnie gwarantując komfortowe i długie użytkowanie. Niskoprofilowa konstrukcja hełmu zmniejsza ryzyko ograniczenia pola widzenia oraz zapewnia kompatybilność noktowizorów i zestawów słuchawkowych.

5d63d33b86f7746ea9275524.Name: Płaski śrubokręt
5d63d33b86f7746ea9275524.Description: Płaski śrubokręt do prac w miejscach z utrudnionym dostępem.

5d6e67fba4b9361bc73bc779.Name: Amunicja śrutowa 6,5 mm 12/70 "Express"
5d6e67fba4b9361bc73bc779.Description: Nabój 12/70 z pociskiem składającym się z 9 śrucin 6,5 mm do strzelb o kalibrze 12ga.

5d6e6772a4b936088465b17c.Name: Amunicja śrutowa 5,25 mm 12/70
5d6e6772a4b936088465b17c.Description: Nabój 12/70 z pociskiem składającym się z 15 śrucin 5,25 mm do strzelb o kalibrze 12ga.

5df25b6c0b92095fd441e4cf.Name: 5-round .308 T-5000 magazine
5df25b6c0b92095fd441e4cf.Description: T-5000 sniper rifle magazine by Orsis, for .308 cartridges.

5e2af2bc86f7746d3f3c33fc.Name: Hunter matches
5e2af2bc86f7746d3f3c33fc.Description: Special hunting matches that burn in the wind and in the water (yes! For real!). Soviet heritage.

5e8488fa988a8701445df1e4.Description: CALOK-B Applicator hemostatic agent, allows you to inject hemostatic granules through the wound opening directly to the source of bleeding in just a few seconds.

5df8e053bb49d91fb446d6a6.Name: KAC Charging Handle for SR-25
5df8e053bb49d91fb446d6a6.Description: Regular charging handle for SR-25 and compatible systems.

5e569a132642e66b0b68015c.Name: CAA DRG L-1 mount for SVD
5e569a132642e66b0b68015c.Description: Barrel mounted Picatinny rail For SVD.

5e81f423763d9f754677bf2e.Description: The standard issue military .45 ACP full metal jeacket round.

5e81c6a2ac2bb513793cdc7f.Name: Trigger for M1911A1
5e81c6a2ac2bb513793cdc7f.Description: Standart-issue Trigger for M1911A1, product by Colt.

5ea05cf85ad9772e6624305d.Description: A non-ballistic replica of the Ops-Core Fast helmet from Tac-Kek. It can be modified by various components.

5e87116b81c4ed43e83cefdd.Name: Polymer stock for M590A1
5e87116b81c4ed43e83cefdd.Description: Classical looking polymer stock for Mossberg M590A1shotgun with rubber butt-plate.

5f3e777688ca2d00ad199d25.Description: Standart-issue slide lock lever for M45A1, product by Colt.

5d6e68dea4b9361bcc29e659.Name: Breneka Dual Sabot 12/70

5da743f586f7744014504f72.Description: A key from USEC stash, located somewhere in Customs area

5dcbd6b46ec07c0c4347a564.Name: Desert Tech foregrip for MDR blk

5df8f541c41b2312ea3335e3.Name: KAC Steel 20 7.62x51 20 rnd
5df8f541c41b2312ea3335e3.Description: 20 rnd, double stack, steel Knight's Armament magazine for a 7.62x51 NATO.

5e2af4d286f7746d4159f07a.Name: Aramid fiber cloth
5e2af4d286f7746d4159f07a.Description: Aramid fibers are a class of heat-resistant and strong synthetic fibers. They are used in aerospace and military applications, for ballistic-rated body armor fabric and ballistic composites, in bicycle tires, marine cordage, marine hull reinforcement, and as an asbestos substitute.

5e00cfa786f77469dc6e5685.Name: TW EXFIL Ear Covers Black
5e00cfa786f77469dc6e5685.Description: Additional armored ear covers for Team Wendy EXFIL Ballistic helmet

5e217ba4c1434648c13568cd.Name: Hexagon "Kocherga" stock red
5e217ba4c1434648c13568cd.Description: Lightweight "Kocherga" stock, product by Hexagon. Anodized red.

5e54f6af86f7742199090bf3.Name: Can of Dr. Lupo's coffee beans
5e54f6af86f7742199090bf3.Description: The famous Dr.Lupo's huge coffee beans. They are really big for sure! The roasting is as hardcore as possible, definitely will hit hard.

5dfe14f30b92095fd441edaf.Name: ETMI-019 Mount
5dfe14f30b92095fd441edaf.Description: ETMI-019 is a universal adapter from 7mm vent plank to weaver/picatinny rail.

5e81edc13397a21db957f6a1.Name: M1911A1 .45 ACP slide
5e81edc13397a21db957f6a1.Description: Standard-issue slide for M1911A1, product by "Colt".

5e56991336989c75ab4f03f6.Description: Prototype handguard for modern SVD kit.

5d6d2e22a4b9361bd5780d05.Description: Okulary balistyczne strzeleckie. Nie tylko chronią twoje oczy, ale również podkreślą twój niepowtarzalny styl.

5ea17ca01412a1425304d1c0.Name: Diamond Age Bastion Helmet
5ea17ca01412a1425304d1c0.Description: According to the manufacturer - the Bastion helmet is the first combat helmet that can withstand a hit from a rifle, even with a bullet with a armored core at a muzzle speed.

5eea217fc64c5d0dfc05712a.Name: SGA stock for M590
5eea217fc64c5d0dfc05712a.Description: Ergonomic polymer stock for Mossberg M590 shotgun with rubber butt-plate manufactured by Magpul.

5f633ff5c444ce7e3c30a006.Name: Avalanche Mod.2 charging handle for AR-15

5df8e4080b92095fd441e594.Description: Upper receiver for SR-25 rifle manufactured by Knight's Armament Company.

5df8a2ca86f7740bfe6df777.Description: Old army body armor from Afghanistan war times, mainly designed to protect against pistol bullets and explosion fragments. It fulfilled his mission, but was soon replaced by bulletproof vests with differentiated protection.

5de8fbf2b74cd90030650c79.Name: B&T MP9 bottom rail
5de8fbf2b74cd90030650c79.Description: B&T bottom rail allows you to install different foregrips on a MP9 SMGs.

5dff772da3651922b360bf91.Name: VOMZ Pilad 4x32 riflescope
5dff772da3651922b360bf91.Description: Designed for shooting at small and medium distances. The sight will be convenient for shooting at moving objects at a distance of up to 150 m.

5e2af47786f7746d404f3aaa.Name: Fleece cloth
5e2af47786f7746d404f3aaa.Description: Insulated, lightweight and water-repellent fabric for the production of various clothes both military and civilian.

5e2af41e86f774755a234b67.Name: Polyamide fabric Cordura
5e2af41e86f774755a234b67.Description: This is a polyamide fabric, in which due to the special structure of the thread (made from cut and twisted fibers) fourfold resistance to abrasion is achieved compared to plain nylon, also consisting of polyamide. Significantly superior to conventional fabric in tensile strength and abrasion resistance. Used for the manufacture of equipment for various purposes: bags, backpacks and additional items to them, waist and bag belts, cases for carrying weapons and so on.

5e2af37686f774755a234b65.Name: SurvL Survivor Lighter
5e2af37686f774755a234b65.Description: Water and windproof lighter for survival in difficult conditions. Well, or just for firing up the cig, you decide, brother.

5e340dcdcb6d5863cc5e5efb.Name: VOG-25 Khattabka grenade
5e340dcdcb6d5863cc5e5efb.Description: Hand-made hand grenade "Khattabka" based on a VOG-25 grenade. The grenade is a VOG-25 grenade with a removed warhead, added a detonator and self-destructor. A short fuse has been installed to speed up the ignition.

5e2af02c86f7746d420957d4.Name: Pack of chlorine
5e2af02c86f7746d420957d4.Description: Chlorine lime is a highly hazardous technical mixture of hypochlorite, chloride and calcium hydroxide. Widely used for bleaching and disinfection.

5e4abc1f86f774069619fbaa.Name: Spiritus Systems Bank Robber Chest Rig
5e4abc1f86f774069619fbaa.Description: Ultra-compact and lightweight chest rig for additional mobility and comfort.

5e569a2e56edd02abe09f280.Name: CAA XD RGL mount for SVD
5e569a2e56edd02abe09f280.Description: Side clip top Picatinny rail For SVD.

5e81c539cb2b95385c177553.Name: Slide lock for M1911A1
5e81c539cb2b95385c177553.Description: Standart-issue slide lock lever for M1911A1, product by Colt.

5e2af51086f7746d3f3c3402.Name: UZRGM grenade fuze
5e2af51086f7746d3f3c3402.Description: Unified Fuse Hand Grenade Modified - unlike UZRG, it contains inside the aluminum bushings a slow-burned pyrotechnic composition with high combustion stability and an azide detonator capsule in an aluminum sleeve. A vital component for the production of grenades.

5d6e695fa4b936359b35d852.Name: Amunicja śrutowa 5,6 mm 20/70
5d6e695fa4b936359b35d852.Description: Nabój 20/70 z pociskiem składającym się z 15 śrucin 5,6 mm do strzelb o kalibrze 20ga

5ed515f6915ec335206e4152.Name: AHF1-M
5ed515f6915ec335206e4152.Description: Military drug based on human antihemophilic factor. Developed by TerraGroup Labs as a powerful coagulant specifically for USEC operatives. Temporarily stops bleeding and increases resistance to new ones. Slightly improves health indicators, leads to dehydration.

5d96141523f0ea1b7f2aacab.Name: "Door Kicker" Boonie hat
5d96141523f0ea1b7f2aacab.Description: Old well-worn, priceless Boonie hat, it is believed that it opens any doors in this world for its owner.

5de8fc0b205ddc616a6bc51b.Name: B&T MP9 side rail
5de8fc0b205ddc616a6bc51b.Description: B&T short side rail allows you to install additional equipment on the side of a MP9 SMGs.

5dfa3d45dfc58d14537c20b0.Name: KAC Low Profile Gas Block
5dfa3d45dfc58d14537c20b0.Description: The low-profile gas block designed for use in AR-10 systems.

5e2af22086f7746d3f3c33fa.Name: Tube of Poxeram Cold Welding
5e2af22086f7746d3f3c33fa.Description: It is an adhesive composition that has a high degree of plasticity. It consists of epoxy resin and is a two-component substance with metal dust.

5df8a42886f77412640e2e75.Name: Velocity Systems Multi-Purpose Patrol Vest
5df8a42886f77412640e2e75.Description: Multi-Purpose Patrol Vest is designed for those patrolling situations where armor is not needed. Light rig with a lot of pouches.

5e4abc6786f77406812bd572.Name: LBT-2670 Slim Field Med Pack
5e4abc6786f77406812bd572.Description: Low-profile medical backpack, which allows you to very effectively place various specialized tools and medicines.

5e569a0156edd02abe09f27d.Name: IzhMash modern rail for SVD
5e569a0156edd02abe09f27d.Description: Prototype of a top rail designed for modern SVD kit.

5e85a9a6eacf8c039e4e2ac1.Description: 23x75mm Buckshot shell designed to be effective on 10 meters or less.

5e87114fe2db31558c75a120.Name: Ghost ring Rear sight for M590
5e87114fe2db31558c75a120.Description: Ghost ring rear-sight for M590, product by Mossberg.

5d8e15b686f774445103b190.Name: Key to HEP station storage
5d8e15b686f774445103b190.Description: Key to Hydroelectric power station's storage on Shoreline

5e2af00086f7746d3f3c33f7.Name: Smoked Chimney drain cleaner
5e2af00086f7746d3f3c33f7.Description: The cleaner fluid is a solution of inorganic alkali, additionally containing active additives. Used for cleaning toilets, pipes and drains.

5de8ea8ffd6b4e6e2276dc35.Name: Standard 9x19 20-round magazine for MP9
5de8ea8ffd6b4e6e2276dc35.Description: Standard 20-round capacity polymer magazine for MP9-based SMGs, manufactured by Brugger & Thomet.

5e5699df2161e06ac158df6f.Name: CAA XRS DRG for SVD
5e5699df2161e06ac158df6f.Description: Picatinny Aluminum Quad Rails For SVD.

5ea17bbc09aa976f2e7a51cd.Name: Surefire SOCOM556-RC2 5.56x45 silencer
5ea17bbc09aa976f2e7a51cd.Description: Surefire SOCOM556-RC2 5.56x45 and .223 silencer, can only be installed on compatible Surefire muzzle devices.

5efdafc1e70b5e33f86de058.Name: Marked with a blue symbol surgical set
5efdafc1e70b5e33f86de058.Description: A well-worn surgical first aid kit for bullet wounds and other serious injuries and wounds, heavily stained with blood and marked with a strange blue symbol.

5ed5166ad380ab312177c100.Name: Cocktail "Obdolbos"
5ed5166ad380ab312177c100.Description: A syringe with a homemade drug, authored by a former employee of TerraGroup Labs. The negative effects are different each time. You can take this risk, as you still have nothing to lose.

5e848db4681bea2ada00daa9.Name: Wooden stock for KS-23
5e848db4681bea2ada00daa9.Description: Wooden stock for KS-23 shotgun with rubber butt-plate.

5ede475b549eed7c6d5c18fb.Name: 40x46 mm M386(HE)
5ede475b549eed7c6d5c18fb.Description: 40-mm shot with a fragmentation grenade equipped with an instantaneous fuse, which is cocked after the shot, at a distance of 15-30 meters from the muzzle.

5f3e7801153b8571434a924c.Name: National match barrel for M1911 .45 ACP
5f3e7801153b8571434a924c.Description: National match barrel for M1911A1 .45 ACP, product by Colt.

5ede4739e0350d05467f73e8.Name: 40x46 mm M406 (HE)
5ede4739e0350d05467f73e8.Description: 40-mm shot with a fragmentation grenade equipped with an instantaneous fuse, which is cocked after the shot, at a distance of 15-30 meters from the muzzle.

5fbcbd02900b1d5091531dd3.Name: SIG Sauer Micro Brake 7.62x51 muzzle brake
5fbcbd02900b1d5091531dd3.Description: The SIG Sauer Micro Brake muzzle brake that can be installed on the patented Taper-LOK mounting system.

5fbb976df9986c4cff3fe5f2.Name: KRISS Vector bottom rail
5fbb976df9986c4cff3fe5f2.Description: A bottom rail for the KRISS Vector submachine gun, allows installation of tactical foregrips and accessories.

5fc275cf85fd526b824a571a.Name: .338 Lapua Magnum FMJ
5fc275cf85fd526b824a571a.Description: A .338 Lapua Magnum (8.6x70mm) FMJ cartridge with a 16.2 gram lead core bullet with a bimetallic jacket in a brass case. Despite its rudimentary design, this cartridge possesses capabilities of piercing basic and intermediate ballistic body protections, as well as providing a considerable stopping power effect and being capable of causing critical adverse effects on the target after impact. However, due to its design, it has a high probability of bouncing off various surfaces.

5d6e68d1a4b93622fe60e845.Name: Breneka HP "SuperFormance" 12/70
5d6e68d1a4b93622fe60e845.Description: Grzybkująca breneka SuperFormance 12/70 do strzelb kalibru 12ga.

5fbbfabed5cb881a7363194e.Name: MCX .300 BLK 171mm barrel
5fbbfabed5cb881a7363194e.Description: A 171mm barrel for MCX-based weapons, chambered in .300 BLK.

5fc4b97bab884124df0cd5e3.Name: SilencerCo Omega 45k piston mount adapter
5fc4b97bab884124df0cd5e3.Description: The Piston Mount adapter for installation of SilencerCo Omega 45k sound suppressor directly onto the barrel threading.

5d6e68a8a4b9360b6c0d54e2.Name: Breneka AP-20 12/70
5d6e68a8a4b9360b6c0d54e2.Description: Przeciwpancerna breneka 12/70 do strzelb o kalibrze 12ga. Do użytku TYLKO przez personel wojskowy.

5d6e6a42a4b9364f07165f52.Name: Breneka 20/70 Poleva-6u
5d6e6a42a4b9364f07165f52.Description: Pełnopłaszczowa breneka "Poleva-6u" 20/70 do strzelb o kalibrze 20ga

5d6d3be5a4b9361bc73bc763.Name: Kołnierz LSHZ-2DTM
5d6d3be5a4b9361bc73bc763.Description: Dodatkowa osłona potylicy i karku do hełmu LSHZ-2DTM.

5dcbd56fdbd3d91b3e5468d5.Name: DT MDR 7.62x51 Assault Rifle
5dcbd56fdbd3d91b3e5468d5.Description: The product of the US-based company Desert Tech LLC MDR rifle is a modular, multi-caliber weapon with compact bullpup layout. Barrel lengths and calibers can be changed by the end user within minutes with a minimum amount of tools.

5de8f237bbaf010b10528a70.Name: B&T adapter for MP9 regular suppressor.
5de8f237bbaf010b10528a70.Description: B&T mount for silencer installation directly onto the barrel of MP9.

5dfa397fb11454561e39246c.Name: 20" barrel for SR-25 and compatible 7.62x51
5dfa397fb11454561e39246c.Description: A 20-inch barrel for AR-10 based weapons for 7.62x51 NATO ammo, 508mm long.

5e4ac41886f77406a511c9a8.Name: Ars Arma CPC MOD.2 plate carrier
5e4ac41886f77406a511c9a8.Description: The second generation of modification of the CPC body armor designed by Crye Precision and adapted by Ars Arms for use by special forces of the Russian Federation. This modular body armor is based on a polymer corset that fits the body, which avoids the backlash of the body arm during active movement and also contributes to a evener distribution of weight. Made in the assault configuration of pouches and armor elements.

5e4abb5086f77406975c9342.Name: LBT 6094A Slick Plate Carrier
5e4abb5086f77406975c9342.Description: Simple plate carrier by LBT company. The most minimalistic design intended for use with chest rigs.

5e54f76986f7740366043752.Name: Shroud half-mask
5e54f76986f7740366043752.Description: Extremely stylish half mask with the Shroud logo. All the Tarkov street guys know who he is.

5e4bfc1586f774264f7582d3.Name: MSA Gallet TC 800 High Cut combat helmet
5e4bfc1586f774264f7582d3.Description: Ballistic helmet MSA TC 800, designed for use by tactical teams of police special forces, in combat and reconnaissance operations. It can be modified by various components.

5ea18c84ecf1982c7712d9a2.Name: Additional armor for the Bastion helmet
5ea18c84ecf1982c7712d9a2.Description: Optional modular armor protection for Diamond Age Bastion helmet.

5e848cc2988a8701445df1e8.Name: TOZ KS-23M 23x75mm shotgun
5e848cc2988a8701445df1e8.Description: The KS-23 is a Russian shotgun, although because it uses a rifled barrel it is officially designated by the Russian military as a carbine. KS stands for Karabin Spetsialniy, "Special Carbine". It is renowned for its large caliber, firing a 23 mm round, equating to 6.27 gauge using the British and American standards of shotgun gauges and approximately 4 gauge using the current European standards (based on the metric CIP tables), making it the largest-bore shotgun in use today.

5ea16ada09aa976f2e7a51be.Name: Geissele SMR Mk.16 13.5 inch M-LOK handguard for AR-15
5ea16ada09aa976f2e7a51be.Description: Geissele SMR 13.5 inch M-LOK handguard for AR-15 equipped with a M-LOK interface for installation of additional devices and accessories.

5eff135be0d3331e9d282b7b.Name: Marked with tape flash drive
5eff135be0d3331e9d282b7b.Description: Flash drive marked with blue tape. Such flash drives are often used by TerraGroup staff.

5eff09cd30a7dc22fd1ddfed.Name: Key with tape
5eff09cd30a7dc22fd1ddfed.Description: A key marked with blue duct tape.

5d7b6bafa4b93652786f4c76.Name: Mocowanie FN RMR do 5-7 Mk.2
5d7b6bafa4b93652786f4c76.Description: Mocowanie Fabrique Nationale Herstal celownika Trijicon RMR, jest również kompatybilne z celownikiem Holosun HS507C.

5df36948bb49d91fb446d5ad.Name: T-5000 Pad
5df36948bb49d91fb446d5ad.Description: T-5000 padded grip product by Orsis.

5dfcd0e547101c39625f66f9.Name: SAG MK1 Freefloat Chassis for SVD
5dfcd0e547101c39625f66f9.Description: Freefloat modular chassis for SVD rifles equipped with "keymod" slots.

5e023e88277cce2b522ff2b1.Name: 7.62x51 mm Ultra Nosler
5e023e88277cce2b522ff2b1.Description: 7.62x51 mm Ultra Nosler - rifle cartridge equipped with a bullet with two separate lead cores with a solid partition between them. The front part is torn quickly, delivering great energy. The base remains intact even when it hits a bone and provides deep penetration.

5de6558e9f98ac2bc65950fc.Name: Scope mount for VPO-215
5de6558e9f98ac2bc65950fc.Description: VPO-215 scope mount is a unversal mount for VPO-215 rifle.

5de653abf76fdc1ce94a5a2a.Name: Metal magazine for VPO-215 and compatibles, .366 TKM 4-round capacity
5de653abf76fdc1ce94a5a2a.Description: Magazine for VPO-215 and compatible systems, manufactured by Molot arms.

5e2aedd986f7746d404f3aa4.Name: GreenBat lithium battery
5e2aedd986f7746d404f3aa4.Description: 3.7 volt battery with a nominal capacity of 3400 mAh. Used in lighting and engineering devices.

5e870397991fd70db46995c8.Name: Mossberg 590A1 12ga shotgun
5e870397991fd70db46995c8.Description: The Mossberg 500 Series is one of the most famous and widespread pump action shotguns in the world. Protects your front lawn since 1961.

5e9db13186f7742f845ee9d3.Name: LBT-1961A Load Bearing Chest Vest
5e9db13186f7742f845ee9d3.Description: Tactical bearing system designed to carry magazines, grenades and special equipment, while using low-profile body armor.

5e81ee4dcb2b95385c177582.Name: M1911A1 Rear Sight
5e81ee4dcb2b95385c177582.Description: Standard rear sight for M1911A1, product by Colt..

5f3e77b26cda304dcc634057.Name: M45A1 .45 ACP 7-round magazine
5f3e77b26cda304dcc634057.Description: Standard-issue 7-round .45 ACP magazine for M45A1, product by Colt.

5efde6b4f5448336730dbd61.Name: Key card with a blue marking
5efde6b4f5448336730dbd61.Description: A single-use plastic key card marked with blue color marking for identification.

5ef32e4d1c1fd62aea6a150d.Name: Caspian Trik Trigger for M1911A1
5ef32e4d1c1fd62aea6a150d.Description: Trik Trigger for M1911A1, product by Caspian.

5ef3553c43cb350a955a7ccb.Name: Wilson Extended slide stop for M1911A1
5ef3553c43cb350a955a7ccb.Description: Extended slide lever for M1911A1, product by Wilson.

5dcbd6dddbd3d91b3e5468de.Name: Desert Tech pistol grip for MDR Black
5dcbd6dddbd3d91b3e5468de.Description: Desert Tech pistol grip can be installed at MDR. Black variation.

5e023e6e34d52a55c3304f71.Name: 7.62x51 mm TPZ SP
5e023e6e34d52a55c3304f71.Description: 7.62x51 mm TPZ SP - rifle cartridge designed for hunting and sport shooting.

5de7bd7bfd6b4e6e2276dc25.Name: B&T MP9-N 9x19 Submachinegun
5de7bd7bfd6b4e6e2276dc25.Description: The MP9-N is a further modification of a MP-9 SMG, which was refined and optimized in cooperation with special units from police and military. The MP9-N is currently in service with close protection teams as well as with SWAT teams worldwide. It is also a perfect choice as a Personal Defense Weapon (PDW).

5df8ce05b11454561e39243b.Name: Knight's Armament Company SR-25 7.62x51
5df8ce05b11454561e39243b.Description: The SR-25 Precision Rifle is the latest evolution of the precision 7.62mm NATO semi-automatic rifle. An ambidextrous bolt release, selector, and magazine release offers the left-handed user the ergonomic advantages inherent to AR15 based controls, as well as giving right-handed users alternate methods of manipulation to increase efficiency of movement. The Drop-In 2-Stage Trigger serves as an aid to long range precision marksmanship. The E2 bolt and gas system provides superior reliability in function whether suppressed or unsuppressed.

5e42c83786f7742a021fdf3c.Name: Object #21WS keycard
5e42c83786f7742a021fdf3c.Description: Electronic reusable key card, belonging, according by the logo, to  TerraGroup Corporation.

5ede47405b097655935d7d16.Name: 40x46 mm M441(HE)
5ede47405b097655935d7d16.Description: 40-mm shot with a fragmentation grenade equipped with an instantaneous fuse, which is cocked after the shot, at a distance of 2-3 meters from the muzzle.

5e87080c81c4ed43e83cefda.Name: 8-shell M590A1 12ga magazine cap
5e87080c81c4ed43e83cefda.Description: 8-shell capacity magazine cap for Mossberg M590A1 12ga shells.

5ef366938cef260c0642acad.Name: Pachmayr "American legend grip #423 for M1911A1
5ef366938cef260c0642acad.Description: American legend grip #423 for M1911A1, product by Pachmayr.

5f0c892565703e5c461894e9.Name: 40x46 mm M433 (HEDP)
5f0c892565703e5c461894e9.Description: 40-mm shot with a fragmentation grenade equipped with an instantaneous fuse, which is cocked after the shot, at a distance of 15-30 meters from the muzzle.

5f2aa46b878ef416f538b567.Name: 18" barrel for RFB 7.62x51
5f2aa46b878ef416f538b567.Description: A barrel for RFB 7.62x51ammo, 18 inch long.

5f2aa47a200e2c0ee46efa71.Name: Kel-Tec RFB regular handguard
5f2aa47a200e2c0ee46efa71.Description: Regular RFB handguard, manufactured by Kel-Tec.

5f9949d869e2777a0e779ba5.Name: Rivals 2020 armband
5f9949d869e2777a0e779ba5.Description: An exclusive armband from the Twitch Rivals 2020 event.

5f647f31b6238e5dd066e196.Name: 23x75mm Shrapnel-25
5f647f31b6238e5dd066e196.Description: 23x75mm Buckshot shell designed to be effective on 25 meters or less.

5fb655b748c711690e3a8d5a.Name: KRISS Vector non-folding stock adapter
5fb655b748c711690e3a8d5a.Description: A non-folding adapter for the installation of telescopic stock buffer tubes on the KRISS Vector submachine gun.

5df8a4d786f77412672a1e3b.Name: 6SH118 raid backpack
5df8a4d786f77412672a1e3b.Description:
The raid backpack 6Sh118 is a set of combat equipment of the 2nd generation "Ratnik" gear kit.
The 6Sh118 tactical army backpack is a modernization of the model of the raid backpack called 6B38 Permyachka. The raid 6Sh118 backpack is an element of individual military equipment of military personnel, designed to carry fire support equipment, weapons, ammunition, elements of mountain equipment, as well as his personal belongings. The backpack can be used during combat operations, during long transitions and raid events.

5df8a58286f77412631087ed.Name: Soft tank crew helmet TSH-4M-L
5df8a58286f77412631087ed.Description: Tank headset TSh-4M-L (Z) -01 is designed to provide two-way radiotelephone communication in objects with a high level of noise, to protect it from climatic factors and from impacts on structural elements of objects.

5e208b9842457a4a7a33d074.Name: Hexagon "DTKP MK.2" 7.62x39 sound suppressor
5e208b9842457a4a7a33d074.Description: DTKP 7.62x39mm shot sound suppressor from the Hexagon company. Designed for modern modification of AK with a 24x1.5 thread.

5e01ef6886f77445f643baa4.Name: Team Wendy EXFIL Ballistic Helmet Coyote
5e01ef6886f77445f643baa4.Description: One of the most recent tactical ballistic helmets with extensive customization capabilities.

5e2af29386f7746d4159f077.Name: KEKTAPE duct tape
5e2af29386f7746d4159f077.Description: KEKTAPE will not be able to patch up your difficult Tarkov fate, But it will be able to fix the boat. Close up a hole in the aquarium. There are lots of things KEKTAPE can do.

5e01f37686f774773c6f6c15.Name: TW EXFIL Ballistic helmet face shield (coyote)
5e01f37686f774773c6f6c15.Description: Low-profile, lightweight bulletproof glass faceplate that quickly and tool-free attaches to the front of the EXFIL helmet.

5e81c3cbac2bb513793cdc75.Name: Colt M1911A1 .45 ACP pistol
5e81c3cbac2bb513793cdc75.Description: Сommonly known simply as "Colt", the M1911 is one of the most famous handguns on the planet. It went through both World War's as a standard-issue US Army pistol, and despite that it was replaced in 1986, its furher variations are still a sidearm of choice in different US Special Forces. M1911A1 is the further generation of a M1911 pistol, after World War I, the military’s Model 1911 went through various changes including shorter trigger with frame cuts, improved sights, an arched mainspring housing and a redesigned grip safety.

5fb6564947ce63734e3fa1da.Name: KRISS Defiance low profile flip-up rear sight
5fb6564947ce63734e3fa1da.Description: The Defiance detachable low profile flip-up rear sight, installed on the mount. Manufactured by KRISS.

5ed515e03a40a50460332579.Name: L1 (Norepinephrine)
5ed515e03a40a50460332579.Description: Sterile disposable syringe with a dose of L1, based on norepinephrine. It is used for short-term increase of strength and endurance, as well as to reduce the pain effect. This activates the implementation of a physiological response such as "hit or run". Increases water and energy consumption.

5ed5160a87bb8443d10680b5.Name: Meldonin
5ed5160a87bb8443d10680b5.Description: A drug developed for athletes. Allows you to conduct more intensive training and to recover faster. Temporarily increases strength, endurance,and also accelerates recovery. An undocumented property was found, it increases the resistance of tissues to physical impact due to internal muscle tension. Because of its properties, it was later adopted by the military as a combat stimulant. It has side effects.

5fb6558ad6f0b2136f2d7eb7.Name: KRISS Vector Gen.2 folding stock
5fb6558ad6f0b2136f2d7eb7.Description: A 2nd generation folding stock for the KRISS Vector submachine gun.

5fce0f9b55375d18a253eff2.Name: KRISS Vector side rail
5fce0f9b55375d18a253eff2.Description: A side rail for the KRISS Vector submachine gun, allows installation of additional tactical equipment.

5fc0f9cbd6fa9c00c571bb90.Name: SIG Sauer Vertical Foregrip KeyMod (Black)
5fc0f9cbd6fa9c00c571bb90.Description: The SIG Sauer "Vertical Foregrip" tactical grip for the KeyMod interface. The grip is made from the highest grade materials and is of an inherent SIG Sauer quality.

5fbcc640016cce60e8341acc.Name: MCX charging handle
5fbcc640016cce60e8341acc.Description: A standard charging handle for SIG Sauer MCX rifles and compatible systems.

5fca13ca637ee0341a484f46.Name: SJ9 TGLabs combat stimulant injector
5fca13ca637ee0341a484f46.Description: Designed for special forces personnel. It makes it possible to reduce the human body temperature for a short time, significantly slowing down the metabolism. The use of SJ9 leads to a significant reduction in the amount of heat released into the environment, while maintaining a safe level of metabolism inside. It is used during night operations, allowing to be hardly visible for thermal imaging devices.

5fc0fa362770a0045c59c677.Name: MCX flip-up front sight
5fc0fa362770a0045c59c677.Description: A detachable flip-up front sight for MCX assault rifles, originally designed for the AR platform. Manufactured by SIG Sauer.

5fc3e4ee7283c4046c5814af.Description: A polymer stock for the UMP SMG, manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

603372f153a60014f970616d.Name: STM-9 9x19 14 inch barrel
603372f153a60014f970616d.Description: A 14 inches (355mm) long barrel for the STM-9 carbine, chambered in 9x19.

6034d103ca006d2dca39b3f0.Name: Hazard 4 Takedown sling backpack (Black)
6034d103ca006d2dca39b3f0.Description: A single-strap sling backpack designed for carrying long-barreled weapons. Additional external pockets are designed to carry magazines, cleaning kit, or extra parts. Manufactured by Hazard 4. Black version.

606f2696f2cb2e02a42aceb1.Name: MP-155 Ultima thermal camera
606f2696f2cb2e02a42aceb1.Description: A special thermal imaging camera for the "Ultima" modification for the MP-155 shotgun. The image from the camera is displayed on the front display on the back of the weapon. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.

6038b4ca92ec1c3103795a0d.Name: LBT-6094A Slick Plate Carrier (Olive)
6038b4ca92ec1c3103795a0d.Description: A simple yet effective plate carrier by London Bridge Trading company. The most minimalistic design intended for use with chest rigs. Olive version.

6038b4b292ec1c3103795a0b.Name: LBT-6094A Slick Plate Carrier (Tan)
6038b4b292ec1c3103795a0b.Description: A simple yet effective plate carrier by London Bridge Trading company. The most minimalistic design intended for use with chest rigs. Tan version.

60a3b6359c427533db36cf84.Name: Military documents #2
60a3b6359c427533db36cf84.Description: A folder with military notes and paper maps. An extremely valuable thing for foreign counterparties.

609e860ebd219504d8507525.Name: Crye Precision AVS MBAV (Tagilla Edition)
609e860ebd219504d8507525.Description: Tagilla's well-worn plate carrier based on the AVS module system by Crye Precision. It has one front panel with three attached pouches. And that's pretty much it. Nothing more, nothing less.

5fc382b6d6fa9c00c571bbc3.Name: .338 Lapua Magnum TAC-X
5fc382b6d6fa9c00c571bbc3.Description: A .338 Lapua Magnum (8.6x70mm) TAC-X cartridge with an 18.4 gram expansive bullet made entirely of copper in a brass case. The bullet of this cartridge provides a good impact grouping at long distances and is designed to be used in Big Game Hunting, as it has a superior stopping power effect for its caliber and is capable of causing critical adverse effects on the target after impact, however, despite the high energy of the .338 Lapua Magnum caliber and due to the TAC-X bullet design, it has difficulties of piercing basic ballistic body protections and has a high probability of bouncing off various surfaces.

5fbb978207e8a97d1f0902d3.Name: KRISS Vector Mk.5 modular rail
5fbb978207e8a97d1f0902d3.Description: The Mk.5 modular system allows you to install additional equipment on the handguard.

5fbc22ccf24b94483f726483.Name: SIG Sauer Taper-LOK muzzle adapter
5fbc22ccf24b94483f726483.Description: The patented "Taper-LOK" mounting system allows the installation of various muzzle devices on 7.62x51 and .300 Blackout chambered weapons. Manufactured by SIG Sauer.

5fc278107283c4046c581489.Name: Mk-18 .338 LM upper receiver
5fc278107283c4046c581489.Description: A regular upper receiver for Mk-18 Mod 1 Mjölnir by SWORD International. Fitted with a mount for attaching additional equipment.

5fb653962b1b027b1f50bd03.Name: KRISS Vector .45 ACP 6 inch barrel
5fb653962b1b027b1f50bd03.Description: A 6 inch (170mm) barrel for the KRISS Vector .45 ACP submachine gun.

602e71bd53a60014f9705bfa.Description: The DLG-123 pistol grip can be installed on any weapon compatible with AR-15 systems. Manufactured by DLG Tactical.

5fd4c474dd870108a754b241.Name: 5.11 Tactical Hexgrid plate carrier
5fd4c474dd870108a754b241.Description: The Hexgrid plate carrier with smooth ergonomic access that allows comfortable movement, intended for use with chest rigs. Manufactured by 5.11 Tactical.

6034d0230ca681766b6a0fb5.Name: CSA chest rig
6034d0230ca681766b6a0fb5.Description: The simplest chest rig, sewn hastily from dubious materials. Designed for airsoft. Military use of this model is possible, but not recommended.

603372b4da11d6478d5a07ff.Name: STM-9 9x19 10.5 inch barrel
603372b4da11d6478d5a07ff.Description: A 10.5 inches (266mm) long barrel for the STM-9 carbine, chambered in 9x19.

606ef0812535c57a13424d20.Description: The "Ultima" modification small rubber recoil butt-pad for the MP-155 shotgun. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.

606ee5c81246154cad35d65e.Name: MP-155 Ultima polymer forestock
606ee5c81246154cad35d65e.Description: The "Ultima" modification polymer forestock for the MP-155 shotgun. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.

607d5a891246154cad35d6aa.Name: MP-155 walnut stock
607d5a891246154cad35d6aa.Description: A Monte Carlo-style wooden walnut stock for MP-155 shotguns with a rubber butt-plate. Manufactured by Izhmekh.

60361a7497633951dc245eb4.Name: Army cap (Flora)
60361a7497633951dc245eb4.Description: A regular army cap, colored in flora camouflage.

606f262c6d0bd7580617bafa.Description: The "Ultima" modification medium rubber recoil butt-pad for the MP-155 shotgun. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.

60a3b65c27adf161da7b6e14.Name: Military documents #3
60a3b65c27adf161da7b6e14.Description: A folder with military notes and paper maps. An extremely valuable thing for foreign counterparties.

6087e2a5232e5a31c233d552.Name: AKM/AK-74 ProMag Archangel OPFOR AA47 buttstock
6087e2a5232e5a31c233d552.Description: The OPFOR AA47 stock from the Archangel kit for AKM/AK-74-type non-folding weapon systems. Manufactured by ProMag.

60c080eb991ac167ad1c3ad4.Name: MBT Integrated Navigation System
60c080eb991ac167ad1c3ad4.Description: The central control block of the GALS-DZ navigational complex for T-72 and T-90 tanks.

60b0f6c058e0b0481a09ad11.Name: WZ Wallet
60b0f6c058e0b0481a09ad11.Description: The "WillerZ" leather wallet. Same as any simple wallet, but fancier.

609a4b4fe2ff132951242d04.Description: An aluminum mount for installing various sights and accessories on to the VPO-102 Vepr-Hunter carbine, manufactured by Arbalet.

60b0f561c4449e4cb624c1d7.Name: LVNDMARK's rat poison
60b0f561c4449e4cb624c1d7.Description: A special agent for the extermination of camper rats and small factory rodents. Contains the special CHAD formula.

60a3b5b05f84d429b732e934.Name: Medical record #2
60a3b5b05f84d429b732e934.Description: A journal with medical notes. The writing is barely readable, but it is of great value to certain third parties.

60a283193cb70855c43a381d.Name: NFM THOR Integrated Carrier body armor
60a283193cb70855c43a381d.Description: The THOR full protection assault body armor equipped with soft and hard armor elements to protect against shrapnel and bullets of pistol and rifle calibers. Manufactured by NFM.

5fbc210bf24b94483f726481.Name: MCX gas block
5fbc210bf24b94483f726481.Description: A gas block designed for the MCX assault rifles, manufactured by SIG Sauer.

5fbe3ffdf8b6a877a729ea82.Name: .300 Blackout BCP FMJ
5fbe3ffdf8b6a877a729ea82.Description: A .300 Blackout (7.62x35mm) BCP FMJ cartridge with a 9.4 gram lead core bullet with a bimetallic jacket in a steel case; intended for hunting, home defense, and target practice, produced by Barnaul Cartridge Plant. Thanks to its rudimentary design, this cartridge is one of the most economical options of its caliber, and despite this, the bullet in this cartridge has capabilities to pierce basic ballistic body protection, as well as certain intermediate models in addition to provide a considerable stopping power effect, however, it has a significant bounce probability on various surfaces. Its design also allows it to be used in STANAG 5.56x45mm NATO magazines without any problem.

5fbbaa86f9986c4cff3fe5f6.Name: KRISS Defiance DS150 stock (Black)
5fbbaa86f9986c4cff3fe5f6.Description: A drop-in replacement buttstock for AR-15/M16 carbines. It uses mil-spec sized receiver extension tubes. The frame profile avoids snagging and shields the release latch, preventing accidental activation. It includes a standard 0.30" thick rubber butt-pad to prevent slippage even with body armor or modular gear. Black version.

5fbc226eca32ed67276c155d.Name: MCX 8 inch KeyMod handguard
5fbc226eca32ed67276c155d.Description: An 8 inch handguard for the MCX assault rifle, equipped with a KeyMod interface for attaching additional equipment. Manufactured by SIG Sauer.

60339954d62c9b14ed777c06.Name: Soyuz-TM STM-9 Gen.2 9x19 carbine
60339954d62c9b14ed777c06.Description: A PCC carbine with excellent performance already "out of the box", manufactured by Soyuz-TM Arms. Designed with the participation of world bronze medalist in Semi-Auto Rifle Vadim Mikhailov. Accuracy, speed, comfort of recoil. Compatible with Glock 9x19 magazines.

5fd4c5477a8d854fa0105061.Name: Security vest
5fd4c5477a8d854fa0105061.Description: The simplest, life-worn vest of the security services.

5fbcc437d724d907e2077d5c.Description: A thin and lightweight stock for MCX/MPX manufactured by SIG Sauer.

5fc23636016cce60e8341b05.Description: A .338 LM muzzle brake developed by SilencerCo.

603373004e02ce1eaa358814.Description: A 16 inches (406mm) long barrel for the STM-9 carbine, chambered in 9x19.

5fbcc429900b1d5091531dd7.Description: A telescopic stock for MCX/MPX manufactured by SIG Sauer.

5fc3e466187fea44d52eda90.Name: HK UMP .45 ACP 25-round magazine
5fc3e466187fea44d52eda90.Description: A standard 25-round .45 ACP magazine for the UMP 45 SMG, manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

5fc23426900b1d5091531e15.Name: Mk-18 .338 LM 10-round magazine
5fc23426900b1d5091531e15.Description: A 10-round Mk-18 magazine for .338 LM ammunition, manufactured by SWORD International.

5fbcbd6c187fea44d52eda14.Name: MCX pistol grip
5fbcbd6c187fea44d52eda14.Description: A polymer pistol grip for MCX assault rifles, manufactured by SIG Sauer.

602a95fe4e02ce1eaa358729.Name: PL-15 9x19 threaded barrel
602a95fe4e02ce1eaa358729.Description: A threaded barrel for the PL-15 pistol, chambered in 9x19.

5fc2369685fd526b824a5713.Name: B5 Systems Precision stock
5fc2369685fd526b824a5713.Description: The Precision telescoping stock manufactured by B5 Systems. Designed to be installed on AR-system weapons.

6034d2d697633951dc245ea6.Name: Eberlestock G2 Gunslinger II backpack (Dry Earth)
6034d2d697633951dc245ea6.Description: The G2 is a mid-sized pack with a full-width scabbard to better accommodate weapons with larger cross-sections or bulky optics. The wide scabbard also allows it to serve as an excellent laptop or military radio compartment, and because it's also wide at the bottom, users have the option of carrying weapons butt-down or butt-up. Manufactured by Eberlestock.

6065881d1246154cad35d637.Name: AR-10 CMMG MK3 RML15 15 inch M-LOK handguard
6065881d1246154cad35d637.Description: A 15 inch handguard for AR-10 weapon systems, equipped with an M-LOK interface for attaching additional equipment. Manufactured by CMMG.

607d5aa50494a626335e12ed.Name: MP-155 walnut forestock
607d5aa50494a626335e12ed.Description: A Monte Carlo-style wooden walnut forestock for MP-155 shotguns. Manufactured by Izhmekh.

60a7ad3a0c5cb24b0134664a.Name: Tagilla's welding mask "Gorilla"
60a7ad3a0c5cb24b0134664a.Description: An armored steel welding mask of Tagilla - the Bossman of Factory. Painted with the special "Gorilla" art.

60a3c70cde5f453f634816a3.Name: CQC Osprey MK4A plate carrier (Assault, MTP)
60a3c70cde5f453f634816a3.Description: The Osprey plate carrier is actively used by the British army and specialists. The Assault preset is provided with heavy armor plates and a maximum of pouches for ammunition and grenades.

5f60c076f2bcbb675b00dac2.Name: Caiman Ballistic Guard Mandible
5f60c076f2bcbb675b00dac2.Description: Special additional ballistic protection for the Galvion Caiman helmet, mounted on the Side rails.

5f4f9eb969cdc30ff33f09db.Name: EYE MK.2 professional hand-held compass
5f4f9eb969cdc30ff33f09db.Description: Hand-held compass. Allows you to quickly navigate, indicating the direction of the magnetic poles of the Earth. With it, you can easily determine the azimuth.

5f63405df5750b524b45f114.Name: VPO-101 SVD style stock
5f63405df5750b524b45f114.Description: SVD style stock for a VPO-101 "Vepr Hunter".

5f6339d53ada5942720e2dc3.Name: Ferfrans "CRD" 5.56x45
5f6339d53ada5942720e2dc3.Description: Muzzle device "Concussion Reduction Device" manufactured by Ferfrans.

5fb651b52b1b027b1f50bcff.Name: Glock .45 ACP 13-round magazine
5fb651b52b1b027b1f50bcff.Description: A standard-issue 13-round magazine for the Glock 21, chambered in .45 ACP.

5fbcbd10ab884124df0cd563.Name: SIG Sauer Two Port Brake 7.62x51 muzzle brake
5fbcbd10ab884124df0cd563.Description: The SIG Sauer Two Port Brake can be installed on a patented Taper-LOK mounting system.

5fd4c4fa16cac650092f6771.Description: A handcrafted chest rig made from IDEA store bags. It's impossible to say that it's reliable and suitable for a wide range of military and tactical applications, but at least it's a good example of a hobo-style rig.

5fc235db2770a0045c59c683.Name: Mk-18 18 inch handguard
5fc235db2770a0045c59c683.Description: A lightweight 18 inch long M-LOK-compatible handguard for the Mk-18 rifle. Manufactured by SWORD International.

5fc23678ab884124df0cd590.Description: A 24 inch (610mm) barrel for Mk-18 .338 LM sniper rifle, manufactured by SWORD International.

60098ad7c2240c0fe85c570a.Name: AFAK tactical individual first aid kit
60098ad7c2240c0fe85c570a.Description: AFAK (Adaptive First Aid Kit). A more advanced version of the IFAK individual first aid kit. The compact kit provides the individual soldier or law enforcement officer with a necessary lifesaving equipment to effectively treat injuries commonly associated with combat trauma.

603648ff5a45383c122086ac.Name: Azimut SS "Zhuk" сhest рarness (Black)
603648ff5a45383c122086ac.Description: A simple nylon bearing system with non-removable pouches. Allows you to carry a fairly impressive amount of ammunition at the expense of convenience.

601aa3d2b2bcb34913271e6d.Name: 7.62x39mm MAI AP
601aa3d2b2bcb34913271e6d.Description: A 7.62x39mm MAI AP cartridge with a two-part armor-piercing projectile, the bullet consists of a sabot and a tungsten carbide penetrator body, in a steel case. This bullet was designed by MAI to increase the penetration capabilities of the 7.62x39mm caliber, thanks to its muzzle velocity and peculiar design, it is capable of piercing basic and intermediate ballistic body protections, in addition to providing outstanding results against some modern specialized protection models, however, it has a high bounce probability on various surfaces.

60229948cacb6b0506369e27.Name: PL-15 rear sight
60229948cacb6b0506369e27.Description: A standard-issue rear sight for the PL-15 pistol.

6065dc8a132d4d12c81fd8e3.Name: CMMG Low Profile gas block

606587e18900dc2d9a55b65f.Name: CMMG buffer tube
606587e18900dc2d9a55b65f.Description: A Mil-Spec buffer tube for attaching various buttstocks. Manufactured by CMMG.

6040dd4ddcf9592f401632d2.Name: Azimut SS "Zhuk" сhest рarness (SURPAT)
6040dd4ddcf9592f401632d2.Description: A simple nylon bearing system with non-removable pouches. Allows you to carry a fairly impressive amount of ammunition at the expense of convenience. SURPAT camouflage version.

609269c3b0e443224b421cc1.Name: SilencerCo ASR 51T 5.56x45 flash hider
609269c3b0e443224b421cc1.Description: The SilencerCo ASR 5.56x45 flash hider is an effective flash suppressor that also serves as a platform for attaching the SilencerCo Saker 556 sound suppressor. Can be Installed on AR-15 weapon systems.

6087e570b998180e9f76dc24.Name: Superfors DB 2020 Dead Blow Hammer
6087e570b998180e9f76dc24.Description: The hammer is coated with urethane which provides a "thud" using steel balls to cushion the impact and reduce the vibration recoil to the handle.

60a7acf20c5cb24b01346648.Name: BOSS cap
60a7acf20c5cb24b01346648.Description: A fancy red BOSS cap. Yo, fella, you da real BOSS now!

5f60cd6cf2bcbb675b00dac6.Name: Walker's XCEL 500BT Digital headset
5f60cd6cf2bcbb675b00dac6.Description: Active hearing protection with optimum electronic processing of ambient sounds without unnecessary distortion.

5f5e46b96bdad616ad46d613.Name: Eberlestock F4 Terminator load bearing backpack (tiger stripe)

5f2aa49f9b44de6b1b4e68d4.Description: Regular RFB rail for mounting scopes, manufactured by Kel-Tec.

5f2aa4464b50c14bcf07acdb.Name: RFB thread protection cap
5f2aa4464b50c14bcf07acdb.Description: Threading protection cap for RFB barrel.

5f647d9f8499b57dc40ddb93.Name: 3-shell KS-23M 23mm magazine cap
5f647d9f8499b57dc40ddb93.Description: 3-shell capacity magazine cap by for KS-23M 23mm shells.

5fbcbcf593164a5b6278efb2.Name: SIG Sauer 7.62x51 3-prong flash hider
5fbcbcf593164a5b6278efb2.Description: The SIG Sauer 3-prong flash hider can be installed on a patented Taper-LOK mounting system.

5f994730c91ed922dd355de3.Name: Rivals 2020 beanie
5f994730c91ed922dd355de3.Description: A special beanie from the Twitch Rivals 2020 event.

5fc3e4a27283c4046c5814ab.Name: HK UMP .45 ACP 8 inch barrel
5fc3e4a27283c4046c5814ab.Description: A barrel for the HK UMP submachine gun, chambered in .45 ACP ammo, 8 inch (200mm) long.

5fc3f2d5900b1d5091531e57.Description: The KRISS Vector SMG is the ideal choice for law enforcement and military seeking a controllable and compact weapon system for close quarter combat environments. The low bore axis and Super V recoil mitigation system allow for controllable shots when firing in full-automatic, or fast semi-automatic follow up shots. Compatible with Glock 9x19 magazines.

5fb64bc92b1b027b1f50bcf2.Name: TDI KRISS Vector Gen.2 .45 ACP submachine gun
5fb64bc92b1b027b1f50bcf2.Description: The KRISS Vector SMG is the ideal choice for law enforcement and military seeking a controllable and compact weapon system for close quarter combat environments. The low bore axis and Super V recoil mitigation system allow for controllable shots when firing in full-automatic, or fast semi-automatic follow up shots. Compatible with Glock .45 ACP magazines.

5fc5396e900b1d5091531e72.Name: HK UMP side handguard rail
5fc5396e900b1d5091531e72.Description: A side rail for the UMP SMG handguard, allows installation of additional tactical devices.

60228a850ddce744014caf69.Name: PL-15 extended front sight
60228a850ddce744014caf69.Description: An extended front sight for the PL-15 pistol, designed for use with a sound suppressor.

602a95edda11d6478d5a06da.Name: PL-15 9x19 barrel
602a95edda11d6478d5a06da.Description: A standard barrel for the PL-15 pistol, chambered in 9x19.

6086b5731246154cad35d6c7.Name: SOK-12 Custom Guns Type-340 handguard
6086b5731246154cad35d6c7.Description: Type-340 is a lightweight aircraft grade aluminium handguard, designed for installation on Saiga carbines. Manufactured by Custom Guns.

60361b5a9a15b10d96792291.Name: Army cap (UCP)
60361b5a9a15b10d96792291.Description: A regular army cap, colored in UCP camouflage.

606dae0ab0e443224b421bb7.Name: MP-155 12ga semi-automatic shotgun

607ea812232e5a31c233d53c.Description: The "Ultima" modification short rail for the MP-155 shotgun, which allows installation of additional equipment on the handguard. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.

5f3e772a670e2a7b01739a52.Name: Trigger for M45A1
5f3e772a670e2a7b01739a52.Description: Standart-issue Trigger for M45A1, product by Colt.

5f6341043ada5942720e2dc5.Name: Aeroknox scorpius pistol grip for AK
